summary: This is not relaed to anything that's happening now but i was having a normal evening, just happily eating some leftover rice...
question: This is not relaed to anything that's happening now but i was having a normal evening, just happily eating some leftover rice for dinner, and i remembered that time we found out dnp's wifi was called team rocket, and now i can't function thank you for listening to my rant b you are awesome
answer:
i’m fucking cackling what nerds (x)

also b, you are awesome for bringing this to all our attention

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: Together, Apart - Chapter Eight

trail.content_raw: L O L Finally did something, so enjoy my exhaustion induced hellscape of a chapter
trail.content: L O L Finally did something, so enjoy my exhaustion induced hellscape of a chapter

summary: Phan Oneshot #5
body:
Phan Oneshot #5

Interactive Introverts 2018

-Do you remember what my line is on the beginning of the show - I asked putting the red shirt on me. Silence answered me so I looked up and realized I am the only person in the room.

-Dan? - I asked hoping for him to jump right behind me, that We won’t go through this again. That he won’t go though this again. I walked around the room and stopped before a door to a garderobe with a big sign “dan and phil” and after a minute i heard a quiet sobbing coming from the door.

-Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage in about 5 minutes - i heard a loud noise coming out from the speakers hanging from the sealing.

I didn’t care. I didn’t care the whole crew is waiting. That the people are waiting. In this very moment i cared only and only about Dan. I walked into the room and whispered:

-Dan? Are you here?

-Y-yeah?

I heard a soft, broken voice and saw a little creature curled up in the room’s corner. I slowly walked to him and placed my hand on his cheek making him pick his head up. He looked at me nervously and I saw his beautiful, brown eyes, all red and wet from the tears which were still falling off his cheeks. His eyes looked sad and terrified. He looked so poor and lonely i nearly started crying.

-I can’t go out there Phil…I just can’t….

Tears appeared in my eyes while my voice were cracking when i tried to calm him down:

-Shhhhh…It’s…It’s okay…it’s okay…

I hugged him and let his head drown in my chest.

-Another panic attack? - I asked carefully, rubbing his curl around my finger. I liked playing with his hair. It was calming. I was absolutely in love with his curls and the knowledge that i can play with them or hold curly boy’s hand was always making me realize- i was absolutely in love with him. I was in love with him to the madness, in this very weird but also kinda adorable way that hurt and felt nice at the same time.

-Yeah…Not cool huh?

-Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage. I’m repeating: Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage.

Dan’s eyes opened widely and suddenly he jumped away from me. He looked so terrified and tired my heart was falling into the pieces.

-Oh my god, they’re going to wait for us. We won’t appear and they’ll hate us. They’re going to hate you because of my stupid panic attack!

I sighed and started walking towards him.

-Calm down Dan, I’m sure they wi…

-I think you should go now - he whispered while a single tear fell down on his shirt.

I stopped walking and looked at him frightened.

I knew what he’s going to do if i’ll leave. Fans may not know this but he does hurt himself. He does hurt himself a lot. In every single video i’m helping him cover his scars, cover his dark bags under his eyes and putting drops into his eyes to make them look less red and sad.

I knew that if I’ll walk through this door, it’ll happen again.

-No - I said faintly while the tears started falling down my cheeks.

-Go - he whispered slowly stepping away from me.

-Dan, no…

-Phil, you can’t stay here. I cannot bring you down with me. I don’t give a fuck you love me, you need to leave his room. You’re going to get your shit together and fall out of love, you… - he said violently till i stopped him screaming…

-No!!! You are the one that need to get your shit together Dan. And i’m going to freaking help you with it. I’m going to make sure you’re okay. Because i love you and you can’t do anything about it.

-Leave this room or…

-Or you what?! You’re going to kill yourself right in front of me?! You’re going to leave me, to die?! Die like my father, like my best friend, like every single fucking person i’ve ever loved?! You know I’m surrounded by sadness and pain. Didn’t I have enough?! Even if my dad and friend are gone you’re going to leave me. Even if you’re the only reason i picked myself up?! You are the reason, Dan! You are the fucking reason!!! And if you’re going to leave don’t even try to believe i’m going to live like you’d never happened to me!!! If you’ll leave i’m going to find some bridge and fall of it…I don’t fucking know! I will swallow some pills, get drunk and get hit my a car, chock myself to death…I will die because you are the death to me and i’m just not able to live without you, Dan! You picked me up and you will be the one that’ll let me fall - I yelled while my face turned all red and my eyes were all wet and irritated.

I lost control. I fell on the floor and started crying. I started crying that hideously and miserably it hurt. Dan slowly leaned towards me and picked my head up telling me to look into his eyes. I raised my eyes and let my eyes get lost in his beautiful, brown darkness.

-I love you - he whispered and kissed me. Slowly and carefully. And it wasn’t just a normal kiss. It was kiss full of pain, full of sadness and fear, full of love…He rested his head on my shoulder and said quietly:

-I’m so scared, Phil.

A single tear came out of his eye and i hugged him fondly to let him lay down on my chest.

We laid on the floor and after a couple of minutes i heard his sleepy voice:

-Are you?

And when he fall asleep in my arms i whispered in his ear:

-I’m terrified…

-Leave this room or…

-Or you what?! You’re going to kill yourself right in front of me?! You’re going to leave me, to die?! Die like my father, like my best friend, like every single fucking person i’ve ever loved?! You know I’m surrounded by sadness and pain. Didn’t I have enough?! Even if my dad and friend are gone you’re going to leave me. Even if you’re the only reason i picked myself up?! You are the reason, Dan! You are the fucking reason!!! And if you’re going to leave don’t even try to believe i’m going to live like you’d never happened to me!!! If you’ll leave i’m going to find some bridge and fall of it…I don’t fucking know! I will swallow some pills, get drunk and get hit my a car, chock myself to death…I will die because you are the death to me and i’m just not able to live without you, Dan! You picked me up and you will be the one that’ll let me fall - I yelled while my face turned all red and my eyes were all wet and irritated.

I lost control. I fell on the floor and started crying. I started crying that hideously and miserably it hurt. Dan slowly leaned towards me and picked my head up telling me to look into his eyes. I raised my eyes and let my eyes get lost in his beautiful, brown darkness.

-I love you - he whispered and kissed me. Slowly and carefully. And it wasn’t just a normal kiss. It was kiss full of pain, full of sadness and fear, full of love…He rested his head on my shoulder and said quietly:

-I’m so scared, Phil.

A single tear came out of his eye and i hugged him fondly to let him lay down on my chest.

We laid on the floor and after a couple of minutes i heard his sleepy voice:

-Are you?

And when he fall asleep in my arms i whispered in his ear:

-I’m terrified…

trail.content_raw:
Phan Oneshot #5

Interactive Introverts 2018

-Do you remember what my line is on the beginning of the show - I asked putting the red shirt on me. Silence answered me so I looked up and realized I am the only person in the room.

-Dan? - I asked hoping for him to jump right behind me, that We won’t go through this again. That he won’t go though this again. I walked around the room and stopped before a door to a garderobe with a big sign “dan and phil” and after a minute i heard a quiet sobbing coming from the door.

-Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage in about 5 minutes - i heard a loud noise coming out from the speakers hanging from the sealing.

I didn’t care. I didn’t care the whole crew is waiting. That the people are waiting. In this very moment i cared only and only about Dan. I walked into the room and whispered:

-Dan? Are you here?

-Y-yeah?

I heard a soft, broken voice and saw a little creature curled up in the room’s corner. I slowly walked to him and placed my hand on his cheek making him pick his head up. He looked at me nervously and I saw his beautiful, brown eyes, all red and wet from the tears which were still falling off his cheeks. His eyes looked sad and terrified. He looked so poor and lonely i nearly started crying.

-I can’t go out there Phil…I just can’t….

Tears appeared in my eyes while my voice were cracking when i tried to calm him down:

-Shhhhh…It’s…It’s okay…it’s okay…

I hugged him and let his head drown in my chest.

-Another panic attack? - I asked carefully, rubbing his curl around my finger. I liked playing with his hair. It was calming. I was absolutely in love with his curls and the knowledge that i can play with them or hold curly boy’s hand was always making me realize- i was absolutely in love with him. I was in love with him to the madness, in this very weird but also kinda adorable way that hurt and felt nice at the same time.

-Yeah…Not cool huh?

-Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage. I’m repeating: Dan and Phil are pleasing to go on the stage.

Dan’s eyes opened widely and suddenly he jumped away from me. He looked so terrified and tired my heart was falling into the pieces.

-Oh my god, they’re going to wait for us. We won’t appear and they’ll hate us. They’re going to hate you because of my stupid panic attack!

I sighed and started walking towards him.

-Calm down Dan, I’m sure they wi…

-I think you should go now - he whispered while a single tear fell down on his shirt.

I stopped walking and looked at him frightened.

I knew what he’s going to do if i’ll leave. Fans may not know this but he does hurt himself. He does hurt himself a lot. In every single video i’m helping him cover his scars, cover his dark bags under his eyes and putting drops into his eyes to make them look less red and sad.

I knew that if I’ll walk through this door, it’ll happen again.

-No - I said faintly while the tears started falling down my cheeks.

-Go - he whispered slowly stepping away from me.

-Dan, no…

-Phil, you can’t stay here. I cannot bring you down with me. I don’t give a fuck you love me, you need to leave his room. You’re going to get your shit together and fall out of love, you… - he said violently till i stopped him screaming…

-No!!! You are the one that need to get your shit together Dan. And i’m going to freaking help you with it. I’m going to make sure you’re okay. Because i love you and you can’t do anything about it.

-Leave this room or…

-Or you what?! You’re going to kill yourself right in front of me?! You’re going to leave me, to die?! Die like my father, like my best friend, like every single fucking person i’ve ever loved?! You know I’m surrounded by sadness and pain. Didn’t I have enough?! Even if my dad and friend are gone you’re going to leave me. Even if you’re the only reason i picked myself up?! You are the reason, Dan! You are the fucking reason!!! And if you’re going to leave don’t even try to believe i’m going to live like you’d never happened to me!!! If you’ll leave i’m going to find some bridge and fall of it…I don’t fucking know! I will swallow some pills, get drunk and get hit my a car, chock myself to death…I will die because you are the death to me and i’m just not able to live without you, Dan! You picked me up and you will be the one that’ll let me fall - I yelled while my face turned all red and my eyes were all wet and irritated.

I lost control. I fell on the floor and started crying. I started crying that hideously and miserably it hurt. Dan slowly leaned towards me and picked my head up telling me to look into his eyes. I raised my eyes and let my eyes get lost in his beautiful, brown darkness.

-I love you - he whispered and kissed me. Slowly and carefully. And it wasn’t just a normal kiss. It was kiss full of pain, full of sadness and fear, full of love…He rested his head on my shoulder and said quietly:

-I’m so scared, Phil.

A single tear came out of his eye and i hugged him fondly to let him lay down on my chest.

We laid on the floor and after a couple of minutes i heard his sleepy voice:

-Are you?

And when he fall asleep in my arms i whispered in his ear:

-I’m terrified…

summary: Also this gets me every time.   'Who would have guessed that out of all the people on the planet, Phil would find someone even...
question: Also this gets me every time.   'Who would have guessed that out of all the people on the planet, Phil would find someone even bigger and taller, someone who makes him look small and fragile when they lie in a cramped bunk together.'  GOD I love your writing. This makes me so soft and it's so true that I'm literally crying. The fact that Dan is Phil's protected has me weak and I love it. :) x
answer:
Hey, want to see me cry? Quote my own writing back to me and say it’s good. I’ll cry, I promise.

Thank you so much anon, you have no idea how much this means to me. I doubt myself in writing so much, I promise I’m not just fishing for compliments or something. I genuinely can never feel like something came across well or that it’s good when I write, so when people tell me that all the pain and effort and self doubt I put into writing something made them feel things, it’s the best feeling in the world and it’s what keeps me going. So thank you so so so much. It’s incredibly sweet of you!
